about_the_game:
Houston joined the Payday Gang back in PAYDAY 2 when his brother, Dallas, brought him in.
While bold and forceful when bullets are flying, his meticulous nature ensured his spot as a mainstay in the gang. After Concord attacked the gang, Houston was arrested by the police and brought to Rikers. While in court, he did all he could to grab the attention of the rest of the gang, who promptly broke him out. He has now recovered from his injuries and is ready to get back to heisting. Claim Houston for free now!

The Houston Character Pack is a free DLC that includes Houston as a playable character, his mask, preset weapon and charm.

content_descriptors.notes: PAYDAY 3 contains repeated displays of gun violence, including the shooting of civilians and law enforcement. PAYDAY 3 references alcohol and tobacco as well as illegal drugs in a lighthearted way.
